text: new paragraph unemployment compensation weekly benefit amount amend rsa by inserting after paragraph iii the following new paragraph a notwithstanding rsa and the maximum benefit amounts in paragraph i for unemployment compensation claims submitted during a calendar year the duration of benefits under this chapter shall be limited to weeks if the state s average unemployment rate is at or below percent plus one additional week for each percent increment in the state s average unemployment rate above percent up to a maximum of weeks if the state s average unemployment rate exceeds percent b in this paragraph state average unemployment rate shall mean the average of the months for the most recent fourth calendar year quarter of the seasonally adjusted total unemployment rates as determined and benchmarked by the department of labor
